May 18, 1996 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-second-section
Test Piece Contest
California Legend
Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Set test piece Best instrumentalist - euphonium Markham. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 7 bands competed.
Oct. 10, 2012, 9:04 p.m. July 1, 2020, 7:52 a.m.
1 Burry Port Town Michael Thorne
2 Markham and District Band H. Jones
3 Newport Borough Band Mark Hutcherson
4 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
5 Blaina & District Bernard Williams
6 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band J. Wynne Williams
7 Pontypool Brass Robert Burnett
